alert.note: Alert for Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 5:20PM CDT until April 28 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Robertson County in central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Calvert, or near Hearne, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hearne, Calvert, Benchley and Mumford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
